subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: D. J. Hernandez escaped a furious rush and scrambled into the end zone for a 2-point conversion in the second overtime yesterday and Connecticut stunned Pittsburgh, 46-45, to earn its first Big East victory.
snippet: D. J. Hernandez escaped a furious rush and scrambled into the end zone for a 2-point conversion in the second overtime yesterday and Connecticut stunned Pittsburgh, 46-45, to earn its first Big East victory.
